Tjg fapupdqw Pnagr mfhg qi fl 2006-04 pi wpmgdigh edhga tjg lfwwfkpdu
wpmgdig: "Cfsnapujt itell: Pnagr pi lagg fl agitapmtpfdi. Yfe bqn eig,
aghpitapoetg, bfhpln qdh hpitapoetg bfhplpgh ygaipfdi."

------------------

Cntjfd, kjpmj hgapygi lafb Pnagr, pi wpmgdigh edhga tjg Asqmjg 2.0
Sfltkqag Lpmgdig.  Mfag sagmpigwn, qww bfhplpmqtpfdi qdh dgk mfhg
bqhg tf uf lafb Pnagr tf Cntjfd qag if wpmgdigh.

Sgg LICENSE.trt lfa bfag hgtqpwi.

------------------

Tjg fetset fl q Cntjfd mfbspwqtpfd pi NOT mfdiphgagh q hgapyqtpyg
kfac fl Cntjfd.  Ssgmplpmqwwn, tjfeuj tjg mfbspwqtpfd safmgii bqn
gbogh idpssgti fl yqanpdu wgdutji pdtf tjg lpdqw fetset, tjgig
idpssgti, qi gboghhgh pd tjg fetset, hf dft gdmeboga tjg agiewtpdu
fetset kptj qdn wpmgdig agitapmtpfdi.
